definition: to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
old variant of 往[wang3]
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Sadly, Dad passed away this past January.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，家父已于今年一月往生。

sentences.english: This is the second instance of one who has illness and has a place where he will be born.
sentences.chinese: 这是他有病业，但仍然可以往生到某个地方去的例子。

sentences.english: To avoid staining the Rebirth Blanket, one can also fold it into a small piece, and put it inside the urn.
sentences.chinese: 为避免往生被沾污，亦可将之折为小块，放入坛内。

sentences.english: Supposing killed accidentally, may it will be reborn in the Pure Land under the blessings of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 一旦误杀，它都能得到佛的加持力，往生净土。

sentences.english: Not only the Bodhisattvas in my land are to be born there.
sentences.chinese: 不但我刹诸菩萨等，往生彼国。

sentences.english: Or should I not think about anything while chanting Amitabha Buddha?
sentences.chinese: 念阿弥陀佛，回向自己往生西方极乐世界。
